comments.body: can we also test `COUNT(DISTINCT id) FILTER (WHERE true)` and `COUNT(DISTINCT id) FILTER (WHERE false)`?

I can't understand this dimension config.
When `spark.sql.codegen.wholeStage=false` and `spark.sql.codegen.factoryMode=CODEGEN_ONLY`.
It means each operator will be compiled into single java and cannot fallback to interpreted ?
Could you tell me more about this?
That means the plan interpreter is  used with the expression codegen (e.g., `GenerateUnsafeProjection`) enabled.

diffHunk:
